chapter.title: Running the Example
chapter.para: To run example, start JBOSS AS container and access its jmx-console. Open http://${jboss.bind.address}:port/jmx-console in browser.

note.para: jboss.bind.address and port depends on how container is started, by default its equal to: http://127.0.0.1:8080/jmx-console

chapter.para: Lookup bean with name equal to: org.mobicents.slee:name=SleeConnectivityExample and invoke operations. Pass distinct argument to operation. If operation is successful, passed value should be shown in &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE Console
